name: Easy WP Optimizer – Optimize DB & WordPress
author: coothemes Team

sections.description:
Easy WP Optimizer allows you to optimize database,Backup WordPress database and non-WordPress-based database (including very large databases), Restore database.
V1.04 – Support zip format backup files download

Tested on

  • Safari
  • Chrome
  • Firefox
  • ie7,8,9,10
  • Edge

Features in Easy WP Optimizer

  • Optimizes the database and improves its efficiency.
  • It supports translation-ready.
  • Backupup WP Database
  • Restore WP Database

Languages

  • English

Translate this Plugin

If you can help us with translation to some other language please contact us at support@coothemes.com

We really appreciate it!

Technical Support

Dear users, our plugins are available for free download. If you have any questions or recommendations regarding the functionality of our plugins, please feel free to contact us.

If you think, that you found a bug in our Easy WP Optimizer plugin or have any question contact us at support@coothemes.com
sections.installation:
Thank you for your interest in Easy WP Optimizer.

Minimum Requirements.

  • WordPress 4.5+
  • PHP 5.x
  • MySQL 5.x
  1. Upload the easy-wp-optimizer folder to the directory /wp-content/plugins/.
  2. Activate the plugin using the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
• Tech Support

Installation Instructions

Thank you for your interest in Easy WP Optimizer.

Minimum Requirements.
  • WordPress 4.5+
  • PHP 5.x
  • MySQL 5.x
  1. Upload the easy-wp-optimizer folder to the directory /wp-content/plugins/.
  2. Activate the plugin using the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
